function.name: es_rangefilter
function.description: Creates a filter, which selects all documents from a search query that have a value between low and high in the given field. This returns a string identifier that can be used to identify this filter. If a document does not have field, it will not be included in the search query.

example.description: Select the documents of type “invoice” from “testingindex” with a value above 100 and below 2000 in the field “word-count”:
